## LongPressHandler.(constructor)

Default constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(element: HTMLElement, onLongPress: (event: MouseEvent) => void);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | HTMLElement | The HTML element to track. |
|  onLongPress | (event: MouseEvent) =&gt; void | The callback to call when a long press occurred. |
